screen_desc: The screenshot displays the Newegg website on a mobile device. The main content includes a banner promoting PC upgrades with discounts, and several navigation options such as "PC Builder," "Gaming PC Finder," and "Today's Best Deals." Below the banner, there are quick access buttons for "Orders," "Wish List," and "Categories." The "Today's Best Deals" section highlights limited-time offers with countdown timers, featuring discounts on PC components like graphics cards and RAM.
action_think: The user has already interacted with the shopping cart, and the cart is currently empty, as evidenced by the clicks on the trash bin icon. The next step involves searching for the product 'Logitech G Pro' and adding it to the cart. Afterward, I will proceed to the checkout page.
action_plan: Click on the search bar located at the top of the screen.
Type 'Logitech G Pro' into the search bar.
Select the relevant search result for 'Logitech G Pro'.
Click the 'Add to Cart' button for the selected item.
After adding the item to the cart, click the shopping cart icon to review the cart.
Proceed to the checkout by clicking the 'Checkout' button.
